__e: I take it this your wedding picture, Mr. Huntoon?
My mother, she... she served in Congress.
He served in the Gulf... of Mexico.
I thought the idea of this was to put those demons to rest.
Our week in sin was just part of his plan to persuade me.
The only reason you paid me any attention was to feed information to my enemy.
I served in the army as a medic.
Served in Vietnam... saw all the shit you see.

And, sir you come to this courtroom where the life of a man who served you faithfully for 1 2 years now hangs in the balance and you tell us you withheld evidence from him that might have assisted in his investigation?
I just saw this woman's picture a long time ago. I fashioned my Riabouchinska after her.
Served two tours as a combat nurse in Vietnam, so I wasn't kidding when I said she was the best, at least in my book.
The book served as a passageway to the evil worlds beyond.
You still had a choice, Helena. Everything you've done has been for one purpose:
The attack was meant only to take food from those who had everything and redistribute it to those who had none.
That your entire career, everything you've ever done in your life, it's all been to protect me.
